title: Busy Atlantic hurricane season predicted for 2020
content:
An above-normal 2020 Atlantic hurricane season is expected, according to forecasters with NOAAâ€™s Climate Prediction Center, a division of the National Weather Service. The outlook predicts a 60% chance of an above-normal season, a 30% chance of a near-normal season and only a 10% chance of a below-normal season. The Atlantic hurricane season runs from June 1 through November 30.
